about_the_game:
Standalone survival mode from the original game Yokai Art

Story

By accident, you broke the seal of the mysterious book in your household's storage. The mythical book contains enormous magical power that allows users to control any Yokai by defeating them and recording their names. This godly power is too much, which alerts all the Yokai. So they are coming for the power. You must find your way to defeat and survive.

Features

  • Roguelike element, each battle will have different strategies and experiences.
  • Total of 15 main and support units with different specialists.
  • Strategically position your units onto a chess-based battlefield to defend your territories.
  • Many unique equipment (More than 30++) that modifies your units. Each unit can equip a maximum of 4 equipment pieces.
  • Extra 2 more slots for more strategy and options.
  • Longer battles with bigger waves of Yokai invasion.
  • Various Japanese folklore yokai with different attack patterns—long-range, melee, tanky units..
